channel.title: Projects on Dami Osayomi
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Dami Osayomi

item.title: Glare detector
item.description:
This app was built as a possible solution to a problem provided by Caliber Data Labs.

This app recieved a POST request with some metadata from an image, and should return a response that verifies if there is a possibility that image has glare (i.e direct sun-glare conditions) in it or not.

item.title: Airline app
item.description:
This is a simple flight scheduling app, built with authentication, using the Django framework.

Functionality

  • Admin can add new users, and groups
  • User can sign in, and view all their flights
  • Admin can add new Airport, Flight, and passengers to those flights

item.title: Social bot
item.description: A simple web application that will post on both twitter and Reddit

item.title: Simple ETL
item.description:
Namaste_challenge

  • Task 1: Python. Data Manipulation and usage of external APIs
  • Task 2: Store this data in a SQL database
  • Task 3: Reporting

item.title: Autonomous drone flight using Computer Vision
item.description: The goal here was to have a drone fly autonomously, while avoiding obstacles (flying through hoops), using Computer Vision
